alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dallas County through 700 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyler, or 7 miles southeast of Selmont-West Selmont. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Selmont-West Selmont, Memorial Stadium, Gardner Island, Dallas County Horse Arena, Tyler, Selma Drag Strip, Edmund Pettus Bridge and Craig Field Aiport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
